title: Bug 22839: Palette Colors Issue with SWT Windows in Focus
description: The bug report discusses problems with palette colors when SWT (Standard Widget Toolkit) windows are in focus.
OB: The bug report title indicates that palette colors are affected when SWT windows are in focus, but the details of the observed behavior are missing.
EB: The expected behavior is that when an SWT window comes into focus, it should not cause issues with the palette colors of other windows, and vice versa.
SR: Steps to reproduce this issue are not provided in the bug report, but they would be necessary to investigate the problem further.
